functions.name: bindingArguments
functions.description: Helper for reading arguments for an element

functions.name: removeHTML
functions.description: Binding function to remove HTML from data and add it to destination

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: removeHTMLAndEllipsisize
functions.description: Binding function to remove HTML from data and add it to destination with an ellipse after X characters. The number of characters is specified with "ellipsisize" argument

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: staticHTML
functions.description: Binding function to remove HTML from data and add it to destination with an ellipse after X characters. The number of characters is specified with "ellipsisize" argument

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: dataAttr
functions.description: Binding function to add a data-* attribute to the element. Use the destination name to specifiy attribute name

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

examples:
//assuming object is { myproperty: 42 }
//will result to

functions.name: addClass
functions.description: Binding function to add css class named after object property. You could format class by using a "format" argument

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: asClass
functions.description: add css class based on a prefix defined with destProperty and the value from the source object

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: toBgImage
functions.description: convert a url string for use as a background image url

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: picture
functions.description: Asynchronously load a picture (using src for image tag and background-image for other elements) from url path, and add 'imageLoaded' css class once picture is ready. You could rely on '.imageLoaded' to add transitions for image loading

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: showIf
functions.description: show element if property is filled or true. The dest property can be used to choose what to use for showing/hiding object (opacity, visibility, or display)

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: hideIfNot
functions.description: Alias for {@link WinJSContrib.Bindings.showIf}, just for semantic purpose

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: hideIf
functions.description: hide element if property is filled or true. The dest property can be used to choose what to use for showing/hiding object (opacity, visibility, or display)

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: showIfNot
functions.description: Alias for {@link WinJSContrib.Bindings.hideIf}, just for semantic purpose

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: enableIf
functions.description: enable element if property is filled or true

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: disableIf
functions.description: disable element if property is filled or true

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: toWidth
functions.description: apply a percent number as width (in percent) on the element

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: ellipsisize
functions.description: truncate a string and add ellipse to the text if string is longer than a limit. The max size of text is determined by a 'ellipsisize' argument

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: twoWayOnChange
functions.description: Two way binding triggered by "change" event on inputs

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: daysSinceDate
functions.description: display number of days since a date

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

functions.name: humanizeDate
functions.description: apply moment.js humanize formatting on a date. Use 'humanizeFormat' and 'addSuffix' arguments to configure binding

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

properties.name: defaultFragmentMixins
properties.description: List of mixins to apply to each fragment managed by WinJS Contrib (through navigator or by calling explicitely {@link WinJSContrib.UI.Pages.fragmentMixin}).

functions.name: define
functions.description: substitute for WinJS.UI.Pages.define that injects custom WinJS Contrib behaviors

functions.name: fragmentMixin
functions.description: Inject WinJSContrib fragment enhancements, such as "$","q", "qAll" functions for scoped selectors, eventTracker and promises propertiesThis enhancement also allows you to add behavior on each WinJS fragment by adding them to {@link WinJSContrib.UI.Pages.defaultFragmentMixins}WinJS Contrib navigator is calling this method before processing the page, so you don't need to explicitely wrap all your pages if you use it

classes.name: DataSourceManager
classes.description: helper class to manage an array with filter and grouping facilities and plug it into listview with or without semantic zoom. This is a low level helper object, it's likely that relying on {@link WinJSContrib.UI.SemanticListViews} will be easier.

constructor.name: DataSourceManager
examples: {@lang javascript}var datamgr = new WinJSContrib.UI.DataSources.DataSourceManager({   defaultGroupLimit: 12,   groupKind: WinJSContrib.UI.DataSources.Grouping.byField,   field: 'metadata.genre',   listview: page.zoomedInList,   zoomedOutListView: page.zoomedOutList});

properties.name: field
properties.description: path to the field to use for groupings

functions.name: prepareItems
functions.description: clean-up, initialise data and bind listviews to data

properties.name: alphabetic
properties.description: alphabetic grouping, use "options.field" to define the property used for grouping

properties.name: byField
properties.description: grouping by a string field on items, use "options.field" to define the property used for grouping

properties.name: byYear
properties.description: grouping by year from a date field, use "options.field" to define the property used for grouping

properties.name: byMonth
properties.description: grouping by month from a date field, use "options.field" to define the property used for grouping

properties.name: byDay
properties.description: grouping by day from a date field, use "options.field" to define the property used for grouping

properties.name: disableAutoResources
properties.description: indicate if fragment should not look for resources when building control

functions.name: offsetFrom
functions.description: Calculate offset of element relative to parent element. If parent parameter is null, offset is relative to document

functions.name: elementLoaded
functions.description: build a promise around element "load" event (work for all element with src property like images, iframes, ...)

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: url used to feed "src" on element

functions.name: loadImage
functions.description: Create a promise for getting an image object from url

functions.name: listElementsAfterMe
functions.description: List all elements found after provided element

functions.name: removeElementAnimation
functions.description: create an animation for removing an element from a list

functions.name: bindPageActions
functions.description: setup declarative binding to parent control function. It looks for "data-page-action" attributes, and try to find a matching method on the supplyed control.You could add arguments with a "page-action-args" attribute. The argument can be an object or a function

parameters.name: element
parameters.description: root node crawled for page actions

functions.name: bindPageLinks
functions.description: setup declarative binding to page link. It looks for "data-page-link" attributes. If any the content of the attribute point toward a page. clicking that element will navigate to that page.You could add arguments with a "page-action-args" attribute. The argument can be an object or a function

parameters.name: element
parameters.description: root node crawled for page actions

functions.name: bindMembers
functions.description: Add this element or control as member to the control. It looks for "data-page-member" attributes. If attribute is empty, it tooks the element id as member name.

parameters.name: element
parameters.description: root node crawled for page actions

functions.name: bindActions
functions.description: setup declarative binding to parent control function and to navigation links. It internally invoke both {@link WinJSContrib.UI.bindPageActions} and {@link WinJSContrib.UI.bindPageLinks}

parameters.name: element
parameters.description: root node crawled for page actions

functions.name: renderFragment
functions.description: render a html fragment with winjs contrib pipeline and properties, and add WinJS Contrib page events.

parameters.name: container
parameters.description: element that will contain the fragment

functions.name: registerNavigationEvents
functions.description: register navigation related events like hardware backbuttons. This method keeps track of previously registered navigation handlers and disable them until the latests is closed, enablinh multi-level navigation.

parameters.name: control
parameters.description: control taking ownership of navigation handlers

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: callback to invoke when "back" is requested

returns.description: function to call for releasing navigation handlers

functions.name: DataFormBinding
functions.description: bi-directional binding for working with input fields and custom input controls. This binding expect a {@link WinJSContrib.UI.DataForm} to be found on the parent form

parameters.name: destProperty
parameters.description: path to DOM element property targeted by binding

classes.name: EventTracker
classes.description: object to register and release events from addEventListener or bind

functions.name: addEvent
functions.description: register an event from an object

returns.description: function to call for unregistering the event

classes.name: MediaTrigger
classes.description: Trigger events on media queries. This class is usefull as a component for other controls to change some properties based on media queries

constructor.name: MediaTrigger
constructor.description: Trigger events on media queries. This class is usefull as a component for other controls to change some properties based on media queries

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: object containing one property for each query

classes.name: ChildViewFlyout
classes.description: This control wrap a navigator into a flyout that appears typically as a side panel. It's intended to provide a secondary navigation mecanism or to enable scenarios like master detail, or content selection

parameters.name: skipHistory
parameters.description: indicate if navigation should skip being added to history

functions.name: canGoBack
functions.description: indicate if control can navigate back

functions.name: open
functions.description: display child view and navigate to target uri

parameters.name: skipHistory
parameters.description: indicate if navigation should skip being added to history

functions.name: hide
functions.description: close all content and hide child view

classes.name: DataForm
classes.description: This control enhance data form management by adding validation mecanism and form state helpers. It must be placed on a form element.Input fields must use {@link WinJSContrib.UI.DataFormBinding} to bind object properties to input

functions.name: save
functions.description: apply changes to source object (relevant only if using workOnCopy)

classes.name: SemanticListViews
classes.description: Control wrapping semantic zoom and listviews with a {@link WinJSContrib.UI.DataSources.DataSourceManager}

constructor.name: SemanticListViews
examples: {@lang xml}

properties.name: zoomedOutListview
properties.description: listview for zoomed out items (usually groups)

classes.name: ExtendedSplash
classes.description: This control displays a custom splash screen. It is primarily focused on WinRT apps but it works quite well in cordova applications (in that case you must add WinJSContrib.ui.crossplatform.js)

constructor.name: ExtendedSplash

functions.name: defaultSplashContent
functions.description: build html content for splash screen

functions.name: show
functions.description: show splash screen during the execution of a promise. After the promise, splash screen will NOT auto-hide

classes.name: FlipViewPager
classes.description: Flipview companion to display pages markers (like carousels)

classes.name: FlyoutPage
classes.description: display html content or target html fragment as a sidebar flyout page

classes.name: GlobalProgress
classes.description: Control for displaying a global progress indicator. The global progress takes care of keeping count of show and hide calls, and it will hide it only when matching

functions.name: show
functions.description: show progress after the throttling delay

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: force hiding progress indicator and reset calls count

classes.name: GridControl
classes.description: Control that layout it's children with different algorythms. Used with {@link WinJSContrib.UI.Hub}, The Grid could rely on multipass rendering to optimize large hub pages load.

properties.name: scrollContainer
properties.description: scroll element containing the grid. Required for multi pass rendering

properties.name: itemInvoked
properties.description: callback triggered when clicking on an item

properties.name: itemTemplate
properties.description: item template (WinJS Template or template function)

properties.name: itemClassName
properties.description: css class added on item's placeholder

functions.name: clear
functions.description: Clear all layout and position styles on items

functions.name: getLayout
functions.description: get layout applicable to the current context

classes.name: HubControl
classes.description: Hub control replacement intended to be used with {@link WinJSContrib.UI.GridControl}

constructor.name: HubControl
constructor.description: Hub control replacement intended to be used with {@link WinJSContrib.UI.GridControl}

properties.name: multipass
properties.description: configure multipass rendering (for using in conjunction with {@link WinJSContrib.UI.GridControl}

classes.name: MultiPassRenderer
classes.description: This control manage multi-pass rendering for improving performances when showing a list of items.The renderer will render "shells" for the items to enable page layout, and render items content on demand, or when items scrolls to view.

constructor.name: MultiPassRenderer
constructor.description: This control manage multi-pass rendering for improving performances when showing a list of items.The renderer will render "shells" for the items to enable page layout, and render items content on demand, or when items scrolls to view.

properties.name: multipass
properties.description: kind of multipass, can be 'section', or 'item'

properties.name: tolerance
properties.description: tolerance for determining if the rendering should apply. Tolerance is expressed in scroll container proportion. For example, 1 means that tolerance is equal to scroll container size

properties.name: virtualize
properties.description: indicate if renderer empty items out of sight

properties.name: scrollContainer
properties.description: Element containing scroll. If scrollContainer is filled, items content will get rendered when coming into view

functions.name: refreshScrollEvents
functions.description: refresh scroll events associated to multi pass renderer

functions.name: clearOffsets
functions.description: Clear cached offsets for bloc and for items

functions.name: updateLayout
functions.description: update ui related properties like cached offsets, scroll events, ...

functions.name: prepareItems
functions.description: render items shells to the page

parameters.name: renderOptions
parameters.description: options for rendering items, can override control options like item template

functions.name: checkRendering
functions.description: check rendering of items, based on multipass configuration (force items on screen to render)

functions.name: renderItemsContent
functions.description: force rendering of all unrendered items

classes.name: MultiPassItem
classes.description: Item for multipass rendering

functions.name: empty
functions.description: empty item and mark it as unrendered

classes.name: SmartListLayout
classes.description: Control to set ListView layout based on media queries

constructor.name: SmartListLayout
constructor.description: Control to set ListView layout based on media queries
examples: {@lang xml}

properties.name: itemdelay
properties.description: delay for each item when staggering animation

properties.name: maxdelay
properties.description: max delay for item when staggering animation

typedefinitions.name: GridControlLayout
typedefinitions.description: Object representing a layout configuration for the grid control

constructor.name: GridControlLayout
constructor.description: Object representing a layout configuration for the grid control
examples: {    layout: 'horizontal',    itemsPerColumn: (options.itemsPerColumn) ? options.itemsPerColumn : undefined,    itemsPerRow: (options.itemsPerRow) ? options.itemsPerRow : undefined,    cellSpace: 10,    cellWidth: (options.cellWidth) ? options.cellWidth : undefined,    cellHeight: (options.cellHeight) ? options.cellHeight : undefined,}

properties.name: layout
properties.description: layout algorythm to apply (horizontal | vertical | flexhorizontal | flexvertical | hbloc

properties.name: itemsPerColumn
properties.description: number of cells per column if using a layout with a fixed number of cells

properties.name: itemsPerRow
properties.description: number of cells per row if using a layout with a fixed number of cells

functions.name: startsWith
functions.description: indicate if string starts with featured characters

returns.description: true if string starts with strToMatch

functions.name: endsWith
functions.description: indicate if string ends with featured characters

returns.description: true if string starts with strToMatch

functions.name: queryStringFrom
functions.description: generate a string formatted as a query string from object properties

functions.name: triggerEvent
functions.description: trigger an event on a DOM node

parameters.name: cancellable
parameters.description: indicate if event can be cancelled

parameters.name: cancellable
parameters.description: indicate if event can be cancelled

functions.name: readProperty
functions.description: Read property value on an object based on expression

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: property descriptor. could be a string in js notation ex: 'myProp.myChildProp, or an array of strings ['myProp', 'myChildProp']. String notation can contain indexers

functions.name: getProperty
functions.description: return a propery descriptor for an object based on expression

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: property descriptor. could be a string in js notation ex: 'myProp.myChildProp, or an array of strings ['myProp', 'myChildProp']. String notation can contain indexers

functions.name: writeProperty
functions.description: Write property value on an object based on expression

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: property descriptor. could be a string in js notation ex: 'myProp.myChildProp, or an array of strings ['myProp', 'myChildProp']. String notation can contain indexers

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: data to feed to the property

functions.name: randomFromInterval
functions.description: generate a random value between two numbers

functions.name: alphabeticSort
functions.description: function to use as a callback for Array.sort when you want the array to be sorted alphabetically

functions.name: distinctArray
functions.description: generate an array with only distinct elements

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: to array's item property used for checking items

parameters.name: ignorecase
parameters.description: indicate if comparison should ignore case when using string

functions.name: getDistinctPropertyValues
functions.description: get distinct values from an array of items

functions.name: removeAccents
functions.description: Remove all accented characters from a string and replace them with their non-accented counterpart for ex: replace "" with "e"

functions.name: removePageFromHistory
functions.description: remove a page from navigation history

functions.name: ellipsisizeString
functions.description: truncate a string and add ellipse if text if greater than certain size

parameters.name: useWordBoundary
parameters.description: indicate if truncate should happen on the closest word boundary (like space)

functions.name: inherit
functions.description: inherit property from parent WinJS controls

functions.name: moveChilds
functions.description: move DOM childrens form one node to the other

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: source node containing elements to move

functions.name: getParent
functions.description: get parent control identifyed by a property attached on DOM element

parameters.name: property
parameters.description: property attached to control's DOM element, for ex: msParentSelectorScope

functions.name: getParentControlByClass
functions.description: get parent control identifyed by a css class

functions.name: getParentPage
functions.description: get parent page control (work only with WinJSContrib.UI.PageControlNavigator

functions.name: getScopeControl
functions.description: get parent scope control (based on msParentSelectorScope)

functions.name: getTemplate
functions.description: get WinJS.Binding.Template like control from a path, a control, a function or a DOM element

returns.description: WinJS.Binding.Template or template-like object (object with a render function)

functions.name: resolveMethod
functions.description: get a function from an expression, for example 'page:myAction' will return the myAction function from the parent page.The returned function will be bound to it's owner. This function relies on {link WinJSContrib.Utils.resolveValue}, see this for details about how data are crawled

functions.name: resolveValue
functions.description: resolve value from an expression. This helper will crawl the DOM up, and provide the property or function from parent page or control.

functions.name: hasValue
functions.description: Checks in a safe way if an object has a value, which could be 'false', '0' or '""'

returns.description: Whether the object has a value or not.

functions.name: formatXHRError
functions.description: format error from an xhr call

functions.name: unwrapJoinError
functions.description: Unwraps the real error from a WinJS.Promise.join operation, which by design returns an array with 'undefined' for all cells,excepts the one corresponding to the promise that really faulted.

parameters.name: errorCallback
parameters.description: The callback to use to handle the error.

returns.description: The result of the callback being fired with the real error.

functions.name: inject
functions.description: inject properties from source object to target object

functions.name: waterfall
functions.description: apply callback for each item in the array in waterfall

parameters.name: dataArray
parameters.description: items to process with async tasks

parameters.name: promiseCallback
parameters.description: function applyed to each item (could return a promise for item callback completion)

functions.name: parallel
functions.description: apply callback for each item in the array in parallel (equivalent to WinJS.Promise.join)

parameters.name: dataArray
parameters.description: items to process with async tasks

parameters.name: promiseCallback
parameters.description: function applyed to each item (could return a promise for item callback completion)

functions.name: batch
functions.description: apply callback for each item in the array in batch of X parallel items

parameters.name: dataArray
parameters.description: items to process with async tasks

parameters.name: promiseCallback
parameters.description: function applyed to each item (could return a promise for item callback completion)

functions.name: crossPlatformClass
functions.description: add css class corresponding to cross platform devices

namespaces.name: isMobile
namespaces.description: check user agent for identifying platform device

classes.name: ConsoleAppender
classes.description: append log to console

functions.name: getLogger
functions.description: get a logger, logger is created if it does not exists

parameters.name: appenders
parameters.description: appenders to add to the logger

namespaces.name: Search
namespaces.description: Small text search features based on objet indexing and text stemming. It's inspired by tools like Lucene.For now indexes are stored with WinRT files, but it will soon be extended to support an extensible storage mecanism

properties.name: weight
properties.description: weight of the item to rank search results

properties.name: key
properties.description: name of the property considered as a key for the items

properties.name: fields
properties.description: object containing item's property path as name, and {@link WinJSContrib.Search.FieldDefinition} as value

properties.name: workerPath
properties.description: path for search worker script file

classes.name: IndexGroup
classes.description: group of indexes

constructor.name: IndexGroup
examples: var idxgroup = new WinJSContrib.Search.IndexGroup({ peoples: { "firstname": { weight: 42 }} });

properties.name: indexes
properties.description: object containing indexes, stored by name

classes.name: Index
classes.description: This class is the heart of the search engine. operations performed by this object are synchronous but exposes as promises.This way Index is almost interchangeable with {@link WinJSContrib.Search.IndexWorkerProxy}

functions.name: count
functions.description: get number of items in index

parameters.name: definition
parameters.description: index definition (optional), use index's definition if not defined

functions.name: addRange
functions.description: add an array of objects to index

parameters.name: definition
parameters.description: index definition (optional), use index's definition if not defined

functions.name: processText
functions.description: prepare a text for search by applying stemming and tokenizing text

functions.name: checkWord
functions.description: Check if a word is a stopword

classes.name: IndexWorkerProxy
classes.description: Proxy for a {@link WinJSContrib.Search.Index} running in a web worker

parameters.name: workerpath
parameters.description: path for web worker script file (optional)

parameters.name: definition
parameters.description: index definition (optional), use index's definition if not defined

functions.name: count
functions.description: get the number of items in index

functions.name: addRange
functions.description: add an array of objects to index

classes.name: Pipeline
classes.description: stemming pipeline

functions.name: add
functions.description: add a stemming function to pipeline

functions.name: clear
functions.description: remove all stemming functions from pipeline

properties.name: common
properties.description: list of common stopwords for french and english

functions.name: readProtocol
functions.description: read protocol arguments from application activation event arguments

functions.name: isConnected
functions.description: Indicate if a valid internet connection is available, even with constrained access

functions.name: hasInternetAccess
functions.description: Indicate if a valid internet connection is available

functions.name: onInternetStatusChanged
functions.description: trigger callback when internet connection status is changing

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: callback for internet status change notification

returns.description: function to call for unregistering the callback

parameters.name: picture
parameters.description: path to a picture to display in the toast

classes.name: Messenger
classes.description: Wrapper for messaging between main code and iframe or web worker. All returns are wrapped as WinJS.Promise to enable asynchronous scenarios

properties.name: SmartWorkerPath
properties.description: default path for smart worker js file

classes.name: SmartWorker
classes.description: Wrapper for {@link WinJSContrib.Messenger} when using it with a webworker

parameters.name: scriptPaths
parameters.description: an array of string paths to js files

functions.name: execute
functions.description: run the callback in the web worker. The callback is serialized to string so you must pass all variable used inside the function as arguments

functions.name: start
functions.description: start an operation within iframe or worker and get a promise for completion

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: name of the event/function to call

functions.name: dispose
functions.description: release messenger and associated resources (if using webworker, worker is terminated

functions.name: registerMediaEvent
functions.description: register an event from a media query
